title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 52.8 - Pilot licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 52.8 - Pilot licenses

State Regulations
(a) There
shall be such grades of pilot licenses as the board may from time to time
designate. Length of service in each grade shall be determined by the board and
such limitations may be revised from time to time in accordance with changing
conditions. (b) Pilots of the first
grade shall be designated as full branch pilots; of the second grade, as
limited branch pilots; and of the third, fourth, fifth and sixth grades, as
deputy pilots. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
52.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
